source.08f4b70a:
# lifetime vs broken
plt.figure(figsize=(12,5))
sns.distplot(df.lifetime[df.broken==0])
sns.distplot(df.lifetime[df.broken==1])
plt.legend(['0 - not broken','1 - broken'])
plt.show()

plt.show()

source.1ea55624:
# team vs broken
plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))
sns.countplot(df['team'],order=df.team.unique())
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))

plt.show()
source.af36af76:
# lifetime vs team vs broken

sns.swarmplot(x='team',y='lifetime',hue='broken',data=df)
plt.show()
source.59eeaec6:

plt.show()
source.7f1699eb:

sns.swarmplot(x='lifetime',y='moistureInd',hue='broken',data=df)
plt.show()
source.94c6b9d5:
Analysis =
    - lifetime is skewed, there are few machines having exceptionally lower value of        lifetime
    - pressure is normall distribution, most of the machines are operated with              pressure bw 80 to 120
    - temperatire  is normall distribution, most of the machines are operated with          temperature bw 70 to 130
    - moisture is skewed, there are few machines which are generating exceptionally         higher moisture

source.0e8ba836:
# Report

**Red Alert**
    - machines having age higher than 60 months are damaged
    - machines generating moisture more than 130 are getting damaged

**Consideration**
    - Machines provided by provider 2 are most qualititaive and are surviving longer
    - Machines provided by provider 3 are damaged early
